resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73392</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73392</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aea-bf68-41f4-2c8c-b20e5c648823#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Pray-kódex.</string>
            <string language="en">Pray Codex</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beten Sie Kodex</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Priez Le Codex</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pray O Codex</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Preghi Il Codice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσεηθείτε τον κώδικα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ruegue El Códice</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">a keresztre feszített Krisztus ábrázolása.</string>
            <string language="en">Representing the crucified Christ</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Pray-kódex,  Krisztus a kereszten,  levétel a keresztről,  látogatás a sírnál,  sírbatétel,  trónoló Krisztus,  tollrajz,  kontúrvonal,  pásztorbot,  Péter apostol,  Halotti beszéd és Könyörgés,  </string>
            <string language="en">Pray Codex, Christ on the cross, descent from the cross, visit at the grave, committal to the earth, Christ sitting enthroned, pen-and-ink drawing, outline, shepherd’s crook, Apostle Peter, Funeral Oration and Entreaty </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellen des crucified Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Représentation du Christ crucifié</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Representando o Christ crucified</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rappresentare il Christ crucified</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αντιπροσώπευση Χριστός</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Representación del Cristo crucificado</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beten Sie Kodex, Christ auf dem Kreuz, Abfall vom 
Kreuz, Besuch am Grab, committal zur Masse, Christ 
Sittinginthronisierten, Federzeichnung, zur umreiß, zu den shepherd?s
Haken, zum Apostel Peter, zur Begräbnis- Rede und zum Begehren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Priez le codex, le Christ sur la croix, la descente de 
la croix, la visite à la tombe, incarcération au schéma couronné et 
à l'encre de la terre, de séance du Christ, au contour, aux 
shepherd?s escroc, à l'apôtre Peter, au discours solennel 
funèbre et à la supplication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pray o codex, Christ na cruz, na descida da cruz, na 
visita na sepultura, em committal ao desenho enthroned, pen-and-ink da
terra, do assento de Christ, ao esboço, aos shepherd?s trafulha, ao 
apostle Peter, ao oration funeral e ao entreaty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Preghi il codice, Christ sulla traversa, sulla discesa 
dalla traversa, sulla chiamata alla tomba, su committal 
all'illustrazione enthroned e a penna ed inchiostro di seduta del 
Christ, della terra, al profilo, agli shepherd?s truffatore, al 
apostle Peter, al oration funereo ed al entreaty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσεηθείτε τον κώδικα, Χριστός στο σταυρό, κάθοδος από το
σταυρό, επίσκεψη στον τάφο, παραπομπή στη γη, η συνεδρίαση 
Χριστού, σχέδιο πέννα-και-μελανιού, περίγραμμα, shepherd?s 
απατεώνας, απόστολος Peter, νεκρικά Oration και entreaty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ruegue el códice, Cristo en la cruz, la pendiente de 
la cruz, la visita en el sepulcro, committal al gráfico enthroned, 
pen-and-ink de la tierra, de la sentada de Cristo, al contorno, a los 
shepherd?s ladrón, al apostle Peter, a la oración fúnebre y al 
entreaty</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            <role>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
